personalInformation.summary: Bilingual Network Engineer offering in-depth understanding of IT infrastructure areas, particularly IT Network Design, Implementation & Optimization of Wired & Wireless Network. Detail-oriented self-starter with demonstrated success in initiating, tracking, reporting and closing projects.
